title: Mountain - Discography [FLAC]
description:

LIVE

OFFICIAL

Mountain - Live - The Road Goes Ever On
Label: BGO Records - BGOCD 111
Format: CD, Album, Reissue
Country: UK
Released: 1997
Originally released 1972

Mountain - Twin Peaks
Label: Columbia / Windfall Records - 472183 2
Format: CD, Album, Gatefold
Country: Europe
Released: ?
Originally released 1974
Recorded live at Osaka Koseinenkin Hall, Japan, August 30, 1973

SEMI OFFICIAL

Mountain - Greatest Hits Live!
Label: King Biscuit Flower Hour Records - 70710-88047
Format: CD, Album
Country: US
Released: 2000
Recorded live on November 3, 1974 at the Capitol Theater in Passaic, New Jersey. From the Archive of the King Biscuit Flower Hour. Collector's Edition liner notes and vintage photos. Digitally remixed from the master reels. 

Mountain - Roll Over Beethoven
Label: Disky - SI 792232
Series: Quality Live Concert Performance Ã¢â‚¬â€œ
Format: CD, Album
Country: EU
Released: 2002
Recorded live at the Capitol Theater in Passaic, New Jersey, on November 3, 1974, for the popular King Biscuit Flower Hour radio series. The show was later released as an album under the title King Biscuit Flower Hour Presents Mountain. This disc is that same show with a slightly altered sequence.

UNOFFICIAL

Mountain - Woodstock, August 16, 1969
Woodstock 2014 Disc 12
Label: The Woodstock Project 
Mixed soundboard, Auditory and other Sources

Mountain - Live At The Fillmore East
Recorded on December 30 & 31, 1970 & January 1, 1971
Unofficial Soundboard Recording - Excellent Sound Quality

Mountain - Olympic Auditorium
Los Angeles, California
March 7, 1970
A quite good mono audience recording

Mountain - New York, Felt Forum 
December 31, 1974 (late show)
Unofficial Soundboard Recording - Very Good Sound Quality
This was most likely "original" Mountain's very last show, recorded on New Year's Eve 1974 at the NYC Felt Forum within the Madison Square Garden complex.

Released: 25 Jun 2008
Originally released 1973
